{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=VAP2400 |fcc_date=06/11/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WAPQ-209AN |manuf_rev=V02 |type=media bridge, access point |fcc_id=ACQ-VAP2400 |ic_id=109AS-VAP2400 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Quantenna |cpu1_model=QT2018BC |cpu1_cspeed=400 MHz |fla1=16 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT2018BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=unknown |eth_chip2_model=unknown |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=an }} {{TagLine|Wireless Video Access Point}}
{{ProductPage|http://www.arrisi.com/products/product.asp?id{{!!}}948}} "576798-001-00", "WAPQ-209AN_V02", "ES0-S03-2302R RoHS"
appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. A C2PC made 07/30/2012 seems to change the board layout considerably..
the initial one may use '''Richwave''' PAs, the second one seems to use '''SiGe''' PA/FEMs {{WiFiCert|WFA12537|09/02/2011}}
